titles: The treatyse answerynge the boke of berdes. Compyled by Collyn clowte, dedycatyd to Barnarde barber dwellynge in Banbery
author: Barnes, satirist.
Clowte, Collyn.
notes: B4 recto caption title reads: Barnes in defence of the berde.  Collyn Clowte is a pseudonym.
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549. --  Fyrst boke of the introduction of knowledge.
